name: AstroPop
summary: AstroPop Deluxe is a simple puzzle game, consisting of rearranging blocks to create four-of-a-kind (or more) matches. The premise is simple enough, and gameplay is just as simple.
info:
• 开发: PopCap Games
  • 发行: PopCap Games
  • 别名: AstroPop Deluxe
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: PUZ
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2004年4月6日
